statements: DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_id = 101 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE age > 30);
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 2005 AND behavior_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND total_amount > 1000.00
